mapper.select: SELECT qpclassify.id, qpclassify.pid, qpclassify.sid,pPosition.name as pName,classify.name as sName FROM red_interview_question_position qpclassify LEFT OUTER JOIN red_interview_position pPosition ON pPosition.id=qpclassify.pid LEFT OUTER JOIN red_interview_position_classify classify ON classify.id = qpclassify.sid where qid = #{qId} ORDER BY qpclassify.gmt_create
